io.micronaut.views

Interface ViewsRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandlebarsViewsRenderer, ThymeleafViewsRenderer, VelocityViewsRenderer

    public interface ViewsRenderer
    Interface to be implemented by View Engines implementations.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo

    • Method Detail

      • render

        Writable render(String viewName,
                @Nullable
                Object data)
        Parameters:
        viewName - view name to be render
        data - response body to render it with a view
        Returns:
        A writable where the view will be written to.

      • exists

        boolean exists(String viewName)
        Parameters:
        viewName - view name to be render
        Returns:
        true if a template can be found for the supplied view name.
